titles.title: Medicaid Data and Benefit Improvement Act of 2016
Medicaid Data and Benefit Improvement Act of 2016
To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to improve collection of Medicaid data and to expand coverage of tobacco cessation services to mothers of newborns.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Medicaid Data and Benefit Improvement Act of 2016
This bill amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to: (1) extend Medicaid coverage of tobacco cessation services for pregnant women through the first full year after giving birth, and (2) add requirements related to the collection of specified Medicaid data from states.
